thread.title: China condemns U.S. navy operation in South China Sea

title: China condemns U.S. navy operation in South China Sea
text:
China condemns U.S. navy operation in South China Sea Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:17 
China’s Defense Ministry says provocative behavior by the U.S. Navy, which carried out a ‘freedom of navigation’ operation in the disputed South China Sea, will only cause the Chinese military to strengthen its defense capabilities. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
China’s Defense Ministry says provocative behavior by the U.S. Navy, which carried out a ‘freedom of navigation’ operation in the disputed South China Sea, will only cause the Chinese military to strengthen its defense capabilities.
